results.headline: Review: ‘First Reformed’ Is an Epiphany. Ethan Hawke Is, Too.
results.summary_short: Paul Schrader’s film about a tormented pastor is a study of spiritual and political despair that is a quiet cinematic revelation.

link.suggested_link_text: Read the New York Times Review of First Reformed

results.headline: Review: In ‘Sollers Point,’ a Hard Road to the Straight and Narrow
results.summary_short: In this film from Matthew Porterfield, a just-out-of-prison young man contends with bad luck and his own unwise impulses.

link.suggested_link_text: Read the New York Times Review of Sollers Point
